title: Did David "Avocado'Wolf publish a note on solar panels drying the light out of the sun?
subtitle: "The solar panels are not renewable, and the light you absorb is lost forever," he wrote, "Like them and their participation!"
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: David "Avocado" Wolfe once published a meme that describes solar energy as non-renewable because light solar panels absorb lost forever.
